meanings.definition: The action of restoring something to a good condition.
meanings.sent1: The reconditioning of the old car made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The reconditioning of the furniture gave it a fresh appearance.
meanings.sent3: The reconditioning of the worn-out shoes turned them into stylish footwear.
meanings.sent4: The reconditioning of the garden transformed it into a vibrant paradise.
meanings.sent5: The reconditioning of the house brought back its former beauty.

meanings.definition: The process of renovating or refurbishing something.
meanings.sent1: After the reconditioning of the kitchen, it looked modern and sleek.
meanings.sent2: The reconditioning of the office space created a more productive environment.
meanings.sent3: The reconditioning of the playground equipment made it more enjoyable for kids.
meanings.sent4: The reconditioning of the computer system improved its efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The reconditioning of the store attracted more customers with its new look.
